info.description:
API definition for eRS

 | API Documentation |
 |-----|
  |[e-Referral Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/e-referral-service-fhir)|


 | FHIR Implementation Guide | Version |
 |-----|-----|
 |[ukcore.release1.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/hl7fhirukcorer4release1/home)||
 |[uk.nhsdigital.r4.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home)||

get.summary: server-capabilities: Fetch the server FHIR CapabilityStatement

post.summary: create-type: Create a new Appointment instance

application/fhir+xml.example:
<Appointment xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">
   <id value="391d8d18-159a-4af8-a935-2238ed4db867"></id>
   <status value="booked"></status>
   <description value="e-Referral Appointment"></description>
   <start value="2022-07-11T12:00:00+00:00"></start>
   <end value="2022-07-11T13:00:00+00:00"></end>
   <slot>
      <reference value="Slot/11000021"></reference>
   </slot>
   <basedOn>
      <reference value="ServiceRequest/000000070000"></reference>
   </basedOn>
   <participant>
      <actor>
         <type value="HealthcareService"></type>
         <identifier>
            <system value="http://fhir.nhs.net/Id/ers-service"></system>
            <value value="11000"></value>
         </identifier>
      </actor>
      <status value="accepted"></status>
   </participant>
   <participant>
      <actor>
         <type value="Patient"></type>
         <identifier>
            <system value="http://fhir.nhs.net/Id/nhs-number"></system>
            <value value="9912003888"></value>
         </identifier>
      </actor>
      <status value="accepted"></status>
   </participant>
</Appointment>

put.summary: update-instance: Update an existing ServiceRequest instance, or create using a client-assigned ID

parameters.name: patient:identifier
parameters.description:
The patient identifier (e.g. NHS Number) that the service request is about

 Caution: This does not appear to be a valid search parameter. Please check Hl7 FHIR conformance.

post.summary: create-type: Create a new ServiceRequest instance

put.summary: update-instance: Update an existing Task instance, or create using a client-assigned ID

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description:
Search by task owner

 | Type | Description | Expression | 
 |--------|--------|--------| 
 | [reference ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#reference)|Search by task owner|Task.owner|

parameters.name: code
parameters.description:
Search by task code (worklist type)

 | Type | Description | Expression | 
 |--------|--------|--------| 
 | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|Search by task code|Task.code|

post.summary: create-type: Create a new Task instance

parameters.name: appointment-type
parameters.description:
The style of appointment or patient that may be booked in the slot (not service type)

 | Type | Description | Expression | 
 |--------|--------|--------| 
 | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|The style of appointment or patient that may be booked in the slot (not service type)|Slot.appointmentType|

parameters.name: schedule.actor:HealthcareService
parameters.description:
A single service ID is required to indicate the service for which appointment slots are required.

 Chained search parameter. Please see [chained](http://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#chaining)

 | Name | Description | Expression | 
 |--------|--------|--------| 
 | schedule | The Schedule Resource that we are seeking a slot within|Slot.schedule| 


 Caution: This does not appear to be a valid search parameter. Please check Hl7 FHIR conformance.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
The free/busy status of the appointment

 | Type | Description | Expression | 
 |--------|--------|--------| 
 | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|The free/busy status of the appointment|Slot.status|

post.summary: create-type: Create a new QuestionnaireResponse instance
post.description: Use this api to create a shortlist

get.description: Use this api to retrieve a shortlist

parameters.name: service-type
parameters.description:
The type of service provided by this healthcare service

 | Type | Description | Expression | 
 |--------|--------|--------| 
 | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|The type of service provided by this healthcare service|HealthcareService.type|

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description:
Can't find this parameter presume need to: External identifiers for this item

 | Type | Description | Expression | 
 |--------|--------|--------| 
 | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|External identifiers for this item|HealthcareService.identifier|

get.description: Unable to find existing matching service

post.summary: create-type: Create a new Binary instance

CapabilityStatement.description: See resource [CapabilityStatement](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/CapabilityStatement.html). HL7 FHIR R4 Schema can be found here [HL7 FHIR Downloads](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/downloads.html)

Appointment.description: See [England-Appointment](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/England-Appointment.guide.md) for the FHIR Profile on resource [Appointment](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/Appointment.html). HL7 FHIR R4 Schema can be found here [HL7 FHIR Downloads](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/downloads.html)

OperationOutcome.description: See resource [OperationOutcome](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/OperationOutcome.html). HL7 FHIR R4 Schema can be found here [HL7 FHIR Downloads](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/downloads.html)

HL7 FHIR R4 Schema can be found here [HL7 FHIR Downloads](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/downloads.html)

HL7 FHIR R4 Schema can be found here [HL7 FHIR Downloads](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/downloads.html)
